body_html:
If I comment that line out it will lead to another issue:

ERROR: /trinity/home/cvsupport/dmitry/tf/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:168:1: null failed: protoc failed: error executing command bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc '--python_out=bazel-out/local_linux-py3-opt/genfiles/' -I. -Iexternal/protobuf/python -Ibazel-out/local_linux-py3-opt/genfiles/external/protobuf/python ... (remaining 38 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found (required by bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc)
bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.8' not found (required by bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc)
bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc)
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build

I think LD_LIBRARY_PATH is being cut somewhere, too.

body:
If I comment that line out it will lead to another issue:
```
ERROR: /trinity/home/cvsupport/dmitry/tf/tensorflow/tensorflow/core/BUILD:168:1: null failed: protoc failed: error executing command bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc '--python_out=bazel-out/local_linux-py3-opt/genfiles/' -I. -Iexternal/protobuf/python -Ibazel-out/local_linux-py3-opt/genfiles/external/protobuf/python ... (remaining 38 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found (required by bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc)
bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `CXXABI_1.3.8' not found (required by bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc)
bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc: /usr/lib64/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.21' not found (required by bazel-out/host/bin/external/protobuf/protoc)
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
```
I think LD_LIBRARY_PATH is being cut somewhere, too.
